message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you consider that price?
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $110.
Hi Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Can you consider that price?
Hi Bob, thank you for your revised offer. I'm still a bit above my minimum price, but I'm willing to compromise. I can sell it to you for $105.
Hi Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you consider that price?
